amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds for DOE's implementation of their proposed Industrial Decarbonization Roadmap.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
